EmailTemplate.name: CIA - Business Credit Account
EmailTemplate.subject: Business Credit Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your recent interest in Australia Post business services.
To be eligible for access to our Shipping and Tracking APIs you are required to have either:
1) An Australia Post business credit account and parcel contract
or
2) A StarTrack 8 digit account number.
If you donâ€™t have one of these you can contact our product support team on 13 11 18 to arrange an Australia Post business credit account or StarTrack 8 digit account number.
Regards
Lodgement & APIs Team
Parcels, eCommerce and Digital
